gw.servlet.filter

Class CacheExpirationFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.servlet.filter.CacheExpirationFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.Filter

    public class CacheExpirationFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter
    This is a servlet filter that adds an Expires header to the request, based on the resource requested. Types can either be specified by file extension to be cached for a specified number of days, or individual files can be specified to be cached "forever" (which means an Expires header of a year in the future).
